meanings.sent1: In our team, collegiality is essential for working well together.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere of collegiality in the office makes it a pleasant place to work.
meanings.sent3: When we all contribute equally, collegiality thrives.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of our success lies in the collegiality among team members.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of collegiality creates a supportive environment for everyone.

meanings.definition: The shared responsibility and mutual respect among colleagues.
meanings.sent1: Collegiality means we all pitch in and respect each other's opinions.
meanings.sent2: The culture of collegiality in our department fosters a sense of unity.
meanings.sent3: Even in disagreements, collegiality helps us find common ground.
meanings.sent4: The fabric of our organization is woven with threads of collegiality.
meanings.sent5: Mutual respect and shared responsibility form the core of collegiality.
